plain_english_summary:
# Strategy: 🧪 BlackSwan Portfolio | Cashen Mod (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/QKjIRxk3HKoYc5yw8XXD/details

**Complexity**: Medium (5/10)
**Description**: https://bit.ly/GenesisLaunch - https://bit.ly/investorcollabdiscord
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 6 assets:

• **Stocks**: SHY, QQQ, TQQQ, UPRO, SQQQ, BIL

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ BlackSwan Portfolio:
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If SHY's returns (5-day) is greater than 0:
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - If :
              - If QQQ's cumulative-return (1-day) is less than 3.0:
                - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                - Buy UPRO (100% of portfolio)
              - Else branch:
                - Buy SQQQ (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - Buy BIL (100% of portfolio)
```

## Technical Details
• **Source Platform**: Composer
• **Source ID**: QKjIRxk3HKoYc5yw8XXD
• **Created**: June 27, 2025
• **Slippage Model**: 0.10% per trade
